title: "‘True need’ for law to recognise international surrogacy, judge warns amid fresh case"
excerpt: "A High Court judge has said he is not convinced legislators appreciate the “true need for expedition” when dealing with the introduction of a law to regularise and recognise international surrogacy. Mr Justice John Jordan said legislation to address legal lacunas arising from surrogacy arrangements was “flagged as necessary” by the Supreme Court as long ago as 2009,"
